title: New cwiki page: IndexUpgrader
description:
The cwiki does not contain any IndexUpgrader documentation, but it is mentioned in passing in the "Major Changes"-pages.

I'm attaching a file containing some basic usage instructions and adminitions found in the IndexUpgrader javadoc. 

Once the page is created, it would ideally be linked to from the Major Changes page as well as the Upgrading Solr page.

comments.author: Ishan Chattopadhyaya
comments.content: Is it something that should go into https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/Upgrading+Solr page?

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content:
I made a page from the HTML file at https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/IndexUpgrader+Tool.

For now, it's in the INTERNAL section to be moved into the published part of the Guide when we settle on where it should go. I'll take a look at that question at a later point in time, for now I just wanted to get the page created.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content:
Still thinking about where to put this. The Upgrading Solr page is really a release notes kind of page, but the only page we have about upgrading is https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/Upgrading+a+Solr+Cluster. 

My current thinking is that I will move it to be a child of the Upgrading a Solr Cluster page, and hopefully soon we will be able to make a dedicated Upgrade section that fills some of the additional gaps around this topic.

comments.author: Bram Van Dam
comments.content:
Thanks for creating it.

What else is missing to create a dedicated upgrade section?

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: I think it's mostly just making the structure for a section - an intro to the general process, making sure it makes sense, covers various use cases, etc. It's probably more of a question of making time to do it rather than needing a lot more content.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: Moved page to be child of https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/Upgrading+a+Solr+Cluster for the 6.1 Ref Guide.
